text.name: info3
text.text: The IBM Personal Computer, commonly known as the IBM PC, is the original

text.name: info4
text.text: version and progenitor of the IBM PC compatible hardware platform.

text.name: info5
text.text: It is IBM model number 5150, and was introduced on August 12, 1981.

text.name: info7
text.text: It was created by a team of engineers and designers under the direction

text.name: info8
text.text: of Don Estridge of the IBM Entry Systems Division in Boca Raton, Florida.
